13 Dec 2024

6 New Young Adult Handbooks

Navigating life as a young adult can be exciting, challenging, and sometimes overwhelming. Whether you’re figuring out your next big step, looking for guidance, or simply seeking inspiration, the right handbook can make all the difference. In this post, we introduce six fresh and engaging guides designed to help young adults tackle life’s challenges, build confidence, and embrace their unique journey. From practical advice to empowering insights, these books are a must-read for anyone stepping into adulthood with curiosity and ambition.

Girl Unplugged Teen Survival Guide

by Nikki Goldstein

Release Date: October 1 2024

Ready to discover unbeatable self-esteem and total body love? Wanna “unplug” from the comparison culture of social media and peer pressure? You’ve come to the right place. Written by an ex-Vogue beauty editor, Nikki knows the media inside and out and can help you unplug from the pressure to look and be a certain way. This book will help you be YOU!

Buy on Amazon

Survival Guide for Boys

by Alex Ryder

Release Date: November 21 2024

Equip yourself with indispensable life skills to conquer the challenges of teenhood. This is your ultimate survival guide to a confident, successful journey toward adulthood.

Buy on Amazon

Life Skills for Teens and Young Adults

by Alexander Knight

Release Date: November 25 2024

Life Skills For Teens and Young Adults is designed to fill the gaps left by traditional education, equipping young people with the tools they need to succeed. Whether it’s managing finances, cooking healthy meals, or building professional networks, this immersive guide does it all.

Buy on Amazon

Smart Social and Money Skills for Teens

by Sydney Parker

Release Date: November 21 2024

Are you ready to step out of your comfort zone, make meaningful connections, and become the confident, connected teen you’re meant to be—even if you’re self-conscious? This 30-day guide is crafted just for you, filled with practical advice, interactive exercises, and real-life stories from other teens who have overcome the same challenges you face.

Buy on Amazon

Life Skills for Teen Girls: Understanding Your Body & Emotions

by Maria Anderson

Release Date: November 14 2024

Packed with practical tools, real-life advice, and actionable exercises, this book offers more than just information—it’s a hands-on resource for parents and daughters to connect and work through challenges as a team.

Buy on Amazon

Everything Teen Girls Should Know

by Teens Mentor Mom

Release Date: November 16 2024

This book isn’t just a collection of advice; it’s a practical toolkit packed with 137 essential skills and strategies every teen girl needs to navigate life with confidence, purpose, and resilience. From mastering time management and building healthy relationships to embracing a positive mindset and understanding financial literacy, this book empowers teen girls to take charge of their future.
